name: emi.arc-infosys
description: The ARC middleware by NorduGrid is a software solution that uses grid technologies to enable sharing and federation of computing and storage resources distributed across different administrative and application domains. ARC is used to create grid infrastructures of various scope and complexity, from campus to national grids.
releaseNotes:
No backwards incompatible changes were introduced in ARC InfoSys Medium priority bugs fixed:

    2835 glue1.2/1.3 fails due to Illegal division by zero at /var/run/arc/infosys/arc-glue-bdii-ldif line 423

    2837 ARC site infosys rendering needs the /opt/glite directory structure

    2897 Infosys does not set ExecutionEnvironment mandatory values as imposed by GLUE2 LDAP latest schema
